title: Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 Update v1.0.4-BAT
description:
Battery

bumax[BAFH]

Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 Update v1.0.4 (c) PlayWay S.A

Release Date: 07/31/2017 Protection: Steam
Cracked By: BAT-TEAM # of Files: few

Game:

Build and expand your repair service empire in this
incredibly detailed and highly realistic simulation game
where attention to car detail is astonishing. Find classic
unique cars in the new Barn Find module and Junkyard module
You can even add your self-made car in the Car Editor

Changelog:

Look inside the pack!

Required:

Car.Mechanic.Simulator.2018-RELOADED
Car.Mechanic.Simulator.2018.Update.v1.0.2.incl.DLC.Unlocker-BAT

Note:

There's a known bug inside the DLC part of the menu, where
the Dodge DLC is shown as not installed. You can mark the
DLC and press 'Enter' and it will show as installed

1. Unpack release
2. Install the Update to where you installed the game
allow run applyPatch.exe after installing
3. Copy the cracked content from /Crack dir
4. Enjoy! :wink:
